about_the_game:
"Qing Yu Nian" is an MMO role-playing game authorized by the original IP of Mao Ni's novel of the same name. Compared with similar games on the market, this game has two significant features.
The plot is deeply restored, rooted in the TV series "Qing Yu Nian", creating a refreshing experience of the TV series plot. Players can not only experience many famous scenes such as the encounter of a couple with chicken legs in Qingmiao, the assassination of Fan Xian on Niulan Street, and the hundred poems of fighting wine at the banquet in the Hall of Prayer for Good Harvest. Many well-known characters such as high-cold Wuzhu, money fan Wang Qinian, and oiran manager SiLili interact and become bonds with each other.
Combat has a high degree of freedom, and the game combat emphasizes "freedom" and "strategy". For this reason, a variety of combat mechanisms have been designed, and various matching moves can be freely combined; weapons can be freely switched during combat; characteristic light-handed combat and partner battle gameplay, etc. , to bring players the fun of free combination of moves, refreshing and changeable during the battle.
